      def say(message="", color=nil, force_new_line=(message.to_s !~ /( |\t)$/))
        message = message.to_s
        message = set_color(message, color) if color

        spaces = "  " * padding

        if force_new_line
          $stdout.puts(spaces + message)
        else
      $stdout.print(spaces + message)
        end
        $stdout.flush
      end
